W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_DIVA_REMNANT_000_DETAIL.text: You found someone who isn't frozen.

W12_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_EVAR_DIVA_RETURN_010_DETAIL.text: Could the thing inside you be your heart? You aren't sure, so all you can do is make your way to the next world.

W12_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W12_WRLD_DIVA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: After walking through the door, you find yourself in a world where everything is frozen. You should seek out an unfrozen soul and see if they can help you find your heart.
